rows.label: tlk70000054_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hi. You've all met
the king, I take it?

rows.label: tlk70000054_02_msg0002
rows.name:
He was a military officer in his
younger days. Led Iira to many a
glorious victory, they say.

rows.label: tlk70000054_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You can see it in the way Adel-sama
leads the resistance army. He inherited
his military smarts from his old man.

rows.label: tlk70000054_02_msg0004
rows.name:
It's no coincidence that there are
many in the militia who would like
to see Adel succeed the throne.

rows.label: tlk70000054_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure he doesn't share
those sentiments, though.
